name: Odos
description: Odos is a market leading Defi aggregator. The $ODOS token powers the Odos DAO’s governance and Loyalty Program: Governance: Token holders can participate in proposal submission and voting to shape the protocol’s future, with decisions executed by community-elected Special Delegates. Rewards: Users earn $ODOS tokens as rebates for swaps and other eligible activities, reinforcing protocol alignment and growth.
